Title: Requires nonpublic schools provide and maintain on-site automatic external defibrillators on school grounds
Summary: Requires nonpublic schools provide and maintain on-site automatic external defibrillator (AED) equipment on school grounds and assure that AED equipment is available for off-site curricular events, extracurricular events or school-sponsored athletic events.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to requiring on-site cardiac automated external defibrillators for nonpublic schools
